original_text:
They would not be like their ancestors—
    a stubborn and rebellious generation,
whose hearts were not loyal to God,
    whose spirits were not faithful to him.
korean_text: 그들의 조상들 곧 완고하고 패역하여 그들의 마음이 정직하지 못하며 그 심령이 하나님께 충성하지 아니하는 세대와 같이 되지 아니하게 하려 하심이로다

sentences.original_text: They would not be like their ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 조상들과 같지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: whose hearts were not loyal to God
whose spirits were not faithful to him
